resources.string:
ZECA is a simple binary classifier, distinguishing slashed zeroes from eights.

TensorFlow lite (tflite) model contained in the application is trained on a dataset of 1854 images of slashed zeroes and eights.All of them are extracted from receipts.

The purpose of the project is to demonstrate how to use the tflite model to classify slashed zeroes and eights.

Here is the Python ZEC project used to train the tflite model.

Here is the current Android ZECA project.
